name: Self-Isolation
text: Give to the Laura Kinney player. Search your hand, deck, discard pile, and play area for Honey Badger and place her facedown under this obligation. If you cannot, discard this card and deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card. Response: After you make a basic recovery, discard this obligation and Honey Badger.

name: Lady Deathstrike
text: When Defeated: The player who defeated this minion discards the top card of the encounter deck and takes 1 indirect damage for each boost icon ([boost]) on that card.

flavor: "Cute kid. Be a shame if something was to happen to her." â€”Lady Deathstrike
name: In the Name of Vengeance
Cybermods
text: Attach to Lady Deathstrike. If you cannot, discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a minion is discarded. Put that minion into play engaged with you and attach this card to it. Forced Interrupt: When attached minion would be discarded, shuffle it into the encounter deck instead.

name: Critical Wound
text: Attach to your identity. Forced Interrupt: When your turn ends, discard this card and take 4 damage.

name: Hack 'n' Slash
text:
When Revealed: Discard 1 random card from your hand and take damage equal to the number of printed resources on it.
[star] Boost: Discard 1 random card from your hand and take damage equal to the number of printed resources on it.
